title: Secrets Behind Indias Agriculture and Ecosystem Diversity #shorts

tasks.task: Attach equipment to a tractor.
subtasks: Pick up the equipment from the storage area.
Walk to the location where the tractor is parked.
Stand beside the tractor.
Open the compartment on the tractor where the equipment will fit.
Align the equipment with the tractor compartment.
Lower the equipment onto the tractor.
Make sure the equipment is properly secured.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor onto the field.
subtasks: Start the tractor engine.
Drive the tractor forward towards the field.
Guide the tractor onto the designated path in the field.
Stop the tractor once it is on the field.

tasks.task: Operate the equipment to till the soil.
subtasks: Operate the handlebars to steer the tractor.
Use the controls to activate the tillage implement.
Move the tractor forward, tilling the soil as it goes.
Monitor the tillage process to ensure even coverage.

tasks.task: Ride the tractor back to the storage area.
subtasks: Navigate the tractor back along the path in the field.
Stop the tractor when reaching the storage area.
Turn off the tractor engine.
Secure the equipment from the tractor.
Remove the equipment and place it back in the storage area.

Ride the tractor back to the storage area.
